body:
This is completely off topic, but here is the place to ask all the stupid questions stored in the back of your head and have them answered by others. Just a few guidelines:
  • Any question(s) discouraging this network/encouraging others will immediately be deleted and will not be answered.
  • Any profane or otherwise inappropriate questions will be deleted and ignored as well.
  • This thread is solely for humor and is hardly serious, so expect some pretty ridiculous answers :)
Here are some examples of questions I'm looking for:
  • If a synchronized swimmer drowns, would they all have to drown?
  • Is the square root of rope string?
  • Why is it a sin to kill a mockingbird but killing something else is just fine?
body_tagged:

title: Official Stupid Question Thread

replies.body:
http://uk.complex.com/pop-culture/2013/04/the-50-most-ridiculous-questions-on-yahoo-answers/47

Faith in humanity destroyed...

Serious note:

  • If job ads say, "Must be fluent in French", why don't they post the entire article in French? Therefore only people fluent in French could apply...
  • If someone commits a truly perfect robbery, will we actually hear about it?
  • Was the person who proof read Hitler's speeches a grammar Nazi?

reply_to.body: Where does night go during the day?
reply_to.body_tagged: Where does night go during the day?

replies.body:
Not sure if that was a serious question, but in case it was:
No, it's not possible to walk on the sun - no matter what. The only reason why Winter is cold is because of how Earth is facing. Obviously, your country is facing away from the Sun, hence the cold weather.
replies.body_tagged:
Not sure if that was a serious question, but in case it was:

replies.body: If you tell a joke in the forest but nobody laughs, was it a joke?

replies.body:
Yes, because a joke is a joke. People just might have stupid ones that make you want to punch someone in the face :)

See, my joke at the end was stupid, and no one probably laughed at it.

replies.body: How do you tell which side of a potato chip is saltier, without tasting it?
replies.body_tagged: How do you tell which side of a potato chip is saltier, without tasting it?

replies.body:
Step 1: Take a swap of both sides of the potato chip using a Q-tip
Step 2: Carefully seal both swabs in a bulletproof bag
Step 3: Use a Greenlee 701K-G Professional Tone and Probe Tracing Kit to check the NaCl content
Step 4: ?????
Step 5: Profit
replies.body_tagged:

Step 4: ?????
Step 5: Profit
